common.offlineIndicator: 您目前處於離線狀態，在沒有網路的情況下，Arduino命令列介面將無法下載需要的資源，並可能導致錯誤。請連接至網路並重新啟動程式。
common.oldFormat: '{0}'仍然使用舊的 `.pde` 格式，是否要轉換至新的 `.ino` 擴充?
common.saveChangesToSketch: 是否在關閉草稿前儲存變更?
common.loseChanges: 如果不儲存，所做的變更將會遺失。

ide-updater.errorCheckingForUpdates: 檢查Arduino IDE更新時發生錯誤。{0}
ide-updater.downloadingNotice: 正在下載最新版本的Arduino IDE。
ide-updater.newVersionAvailable: 有新版本的Arduino IDE({0})可供下載。
ide-updater.goToDownloadPage: Arduino IDE可以更新，但我們無法自動下載與安裝。請至下載頁面下載最新的版本。
ide-updater.noUpdatesAvailable: Arduino IDE目前沒有更新的版本。

preferences.language.log: True則Arduino語言伺服器會自動在草稿資料夾產生日誌檔案。預設為false。
preferences.compile.verbose: True則輸出詳細編譯資訊。預設為False
preferences.upload.verbose: True則輸出詳細上傳資訊。預設為False
preferences.window.autoScale: True則使用者介面隨字體大小自動縮放。
preferences.window.zoomLevel: 調整視窗的縮放大小。預設大小為0，增加(例如1)或者減少(例如-1)代表縮放增加或減少20%。可以自行輸入小數調整更精細的大小。
preferences.ide.updateChannel: 前往版本釋出頻道獲取更新。 'stable'表示為穩定的版本， 'nightly' 則是最新的開發版本。
preferences.board.certificates: 可上傳至開發版的證書列表
preferences.sketchbook.showAllFiles: True則顯示所有草稿中的草稿檔案。預設為false。
preferences.cloud.enabled: True則啟用草稿同步功能。預設為true。
preferences.cloud.pull.warn: True則在取出雲端草稿時警告使用者。預設為true。
preferences.cloud.push.warn: True則在更改雲端草稿時警告使用者。預設為True。
preferences.cloud.pushpublic.warn: True則在更改一個公開草稿到雲端時警告使用者。預設為true
preferences.cloud.sketchSyncEnpoint: 用來從後台更改與取出草稿的端點。預設的端點是指向Arduino Cloud API。
preferences.auth.registerUri: 用於註冊新使用者的地址
preferences.additionalManagerURLs: 其他開發版管理器網址
preferences.newSketchbookLocation: 選取新的草稿資料夾位置
preferences.enterAdditionalURLs: 輸入其他網址，每行一個
preferences.unofficialBoardSupport: 點擊以取得支援非官方開發版的網址列表
preferences.invalid.sketchbook.location: 無效的草稿資料夾位置:{0}
preferences.invalid.editorFontSize: 無效的編輯器字體大小。它必須是正整數。

cloud.privateVisibility: 私人的。只有你可以查看草稿。
cloud.publicVisibility: 公開的。擁有連結的人都可以查看草稿。
cloud.showHideRemoveSketchbook: 顯示/隱藏遠端草稿資料夾
cloud.emptySketchbook: 您的草稿資料夾是空的
cloud.visitArduinoCloud: 前往Arduino Cloud建立雲端草稿。
cloud.syncEditSketches: 同步和編輯您的Arduino Clou草稿
cloud.pushSketchMsg: 這是一個公開草稿，在更改前，請確認所有敏感資訊都定義在arduino_secrets.h中。可以在分享介面設定為私人草稿。
cloud.pullSketchMsg: 從雲端中讀取這個草稿將會覆蓋本地的版本。你確定要繼續嗎?
cloud.notYetPulled: 無法更改至雲端。尚未被讀取。
cloud.pullFirst: 您必些先讀取才能更改至Cloud。

board.installNow: The "{0} {1}" core has to be installed for the currently selected "{2}" board. Do you want to install it now?
board.configDialog1: Select both a Board and a Port if you want to upload a sketch.
board.configDialog2: If you only select a Board you will be able to compile, but not to upload your sketch.
board.pleasePickBoard: Please pick a board connected to the port you have selected.
board.showAllAvailablePorts: Shows all available ports when enabled
board.couldNotFindPreviouslySelected: Could not find previously selected board '{0}' in installed platform '{1}'. Please manually reselect the board you want to use. Do you want to reselect it now?
board.noFQBN: The FQBN is not available for the selected board "{0}". Do you have the corresponding core installed?
board.selectBoardForInfo: Please select a board to obtain board info.
board.platformMissing: The platform for the selected '{0}' board is not installed.
board.selectPortForInfo: Please select a port to obtain board info.

contributions.fileAdded: One file added to the sketch.

library.overwriteExistingLibrary: Do you want to overwrite the existing library?
library.namedLibraryAlreadyExists: A library folder named {0} already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
library.libraryAlreadyExists: A library already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
library.title: Library Manager
library.needsOneDependency: The library {0}:{1} needs another dependency currently not installed:
library.needsMultipleDependencies: The library {0}:{1} needs some other dependencies currently not installed:
library.installOneMissingDependency: Would you like to install the missing dependency?
library.installMissingDependencies: Would you like to install all the missing dependencies?

arduino.selectZip: Select a zip file containing the library you'd like to add

sketch.movingMsg:
The file "{0}" needs to be inside a sketch folder named "{1}".
Create this folder, move the file, and continue?
sketch.cantOpen: A folder named "{0}" already exists. Can't open sketch.
sketch.userFieldsNotFoundError: Can't find user fields for connected board
sketch.couldNotConnectToSerial: Could not reconnect to serial port. {0}
sketch.close: Are you sure you want to close the sketch?

certificate.addURL: Add URL to fetch SSL certificate
certificate.selectDestinationBoardToUpload: 2. Select destination board and upload certificate

firmware.overwriteSketch: Installation will overwrite the Sketch on the board.

serial.notConnected: Not connected. Select a board and a port to connect automatically.
serial.message: Message ({0} + Enter to send message to '{1}' on '{2}')
serial.connectionBusy: Connection failed. Serial port is busy: {0}
serial.failedReconnect: Failed to reconnect {0} to serial port after 10 consecutive attempts. The {1} serial port is busy.

electron.couldNotSave: Could not save the sketch. Please copy your unsaved work into your favorite text editor, and restart the IDE.
electron.unsavedChanges: Any unsaved changes will not be saved.

core.couldNotSave: Could not save the sketch. Please copy your unsaved work into your favorite text editor, and restart the IDE.
core.cannotConnectDaemon: Cannot connect to the CLI daemon.

debug.typeNotSupported: The debug session type "{0}" is not supported.
debug.startError: There was an error starting the debug session, check the logs for more details.

workspace.deleteCurrentSketch: Do you want to delete the current sketch?
workspace.sketchDirectoryError: There was an error creating the sketch directory. See the log for more details. The application will probably not work as expected.
